Quick notes for beta-testers

1. For now you will have a much better experience on desktop rather than mobile

2. Press 'a' and click on a module to move it around. Press Shift + 'a' to move and duplicate

3. If you find bugs, reload the page. Let me know if you can reproduce it

4. If you get to a design you like, send me a screenshot for now

5. Here are some examples to get you started
